mageGuild1.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild1.name: Mage Guild Level 1

mageGuild2.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild2.name: Mage Guild Level 2

mageGuild3.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild3.name: Mage Guild Level 3

mageGuild4.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.
mageGuild4.name: Mage Guild Level 4

mageGuild5.description: Entering the Mage Guild will allow a visiting hero to learn the spells kept within.

tavern.name: Tavern
tavern.description: The Tavern increases morale for troops defending the city.

shipyard.name: Shipyard
shipyard.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.

fort.name: Fort
fort.description: The Fort provides your town with defensive walls.

citadel.name: Citadel
citadel.description: Including a 50% increase to base creature growth, the Citadel adds a keep, and other terrain obstacles, to a town's defenses.

castle.name: Castle
castle.description: The Castle adds two arrow towers, fortifies your town's defenses, and doubles base creature growth.

villageHall.name: Village Hall
villageHall.description: The Village Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 500 gold per day.

townHall.name: Town Hall
townHall.description: The Town Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 1000 gold per day.

cityHall.name: City Hall
cityHall.description: The City Hall allows you to purchase town structures and earns your kingdom 2000 gold per day.

capitol.name: Capitol
capitol.description: The Capitol earns your kingdom 4000 gold per day.

marketplace.name: Marketplace
marketplace.description: With the Marketplace, you can buy and sell resources (exchange rates increase with each Marketplace you own).

resourceSilo.description: The Resourse Silo provides you with an additional +1 ore and wood each day.
resourceSilo.name: Resourse Silo

blacksmith.description: The Blacksmith provides your armies with Ballista.
blacksmith.name: Blacksmith

horde1.description: The Ensilage increases Cucumbers production by 5 per week.
horde1.name: Ensilage

horde1Upgr.description: The Ensilage increases Cossack Cucumbers production by 5 per week.
horde1Upgr.name: Ensilage

ship.name: Shipyard
ship.description: The Shipyard allows you to purchase ships.

special1.description: Composters allow you to sacrifice a part of resources for increase the next week growth of creatures in the city (not working yet).
special1.name: Composters

special2.description: Allows you to recruit army of random vegetables creatures every week (not working yet).
special2.name: Greengrocer

grail.description: The presence of the Ever-growing Bean increases weekly creature generation by 50% and provides your kingdom with an additional 5000 gold each day.
grail.name: Ever-growing Bean

leg1A.description: The Cultivation of Peas allows you to recruite Peas.
leg1A.name: Cultivation of Peas

dwellingLvl2.description: The Cultivation of Cucumbers allows you to recruite Cucumbers.
dwellingLvl2.name: Cultivation of Cucumbers

dwellingLvl3.description: The Cultivation of Onions allows you to recruite Onions.
dwellingLvl3.name: Cultivation of Onions

dwellingLvl4.description: The Cultivation of Eggplants allows you to recruite Eggplants.
dwellingLvl4.name: Cultivation of Eggplants

dwellingLvl5.description: The Cultivation of Pumpkins allows you to recruite Pumpkins.
dwellingLvl5.name: Cultivation of Pumpkins

dwellingLvl6.description: The Cultivation of Broccoli allows you to recruite Broccoli.
dwellingLvl6.name: Cultivation of Broccoli

dwellingLvl7.description: The Cultivation of Potatoes allows you to recruite Potatoes.
dwellingLvl7.name: Cultivation of Potatoes

leg1B.description: The Peas Barracks allow you to recruite Tyrolean peas.
leg1B.name: Peas Barracks

dwellingUpLvl2.description: The Parlor allows you to recruite Cossack Cucumbers.
dwellingUpLvl2.name: Parlor

dwellingUpLvl3.description: The Glass Dojo allows you to recruite Samurai Onions.
dwellingUpLvl3.name: Glass Dojo

dwellingUpLvl4.description: The Menhir allows you to recruite Wild Eggplants.
dwellingUpLvl4.name: Menhir

dwellingUpLvl5.description: The Field of Doom allows you to recruite Pumpkinheads.
dwellingUpLvl5.name: Field of Doom

dwellingUpLvl6.description: The Palace allows you to recruite Broccoli Lords.
